items.q: What are the main features of the website?
items.a: Holiday Calendar provides information on all U.S. holidays, including holiday countdowns, origins, guides, celebration suggestions, and taboos.

items.q: How are the holiday countdowns on the homepage organized?
items.a: The homepage displays countdowns for the next three upcoming holidays, helping users quickly see what's coming next.

items.q: How can I view the full list of holidays?
items.a: You can access the complete holiday list from the homepage, where holidays are arranged chronologically. Clicking on any holiday will take you to its detailed page.

items.q: What information is included on the holiday detail pages?
items.a: Each holiday detail page includes a countdown, the holiday's origin, guides, celebration ideas, and relevant taboos.

items.q: Are the sources of holiday information reliable?
items.a: Yes, all holiday information is based on authoritative sources and historical records to ensure accuracy and reliability.

items.q: Does the website include both federal and state holidays?
items.a: Yes, we provide information on federal holidays as well as unique holidays observed in specific states.

items.q: Why are there taboos for some holidays?
items.a: Certain holidays are tied to specific cultural or religious traditions, which may include unique practices and taboos. These are explained in detail on the holiday pages.
